adHeader: ► Lowest cost Dentist for tough economic times◄
adDetails: Smiley Doctor have friendly dental practice in heart of San Jose right next to Valley Fail Mall and Santana Row (880-280 intersection) Times are tough and seems to be getting tougher everyday. We at Smileydoctor understand the pain and would like to help the community by providing the services at the most reasonable charges. Infact, You can get quote for any service from any other dentist and we can assure you that our charges would be way less. We do Offer Free Consults and Free Second opinion. Best Services - Lowest Prices ->Digital X Rays ->Laser Treatment ->Ultrasonic Scaler ->Zoom 2 Laser teeth whitening ->Needleless anesthesia and more. We do cosmetic, general , pediatric and geriatric dentistry - Member of American Dental Association - Member of California Dental Association - Member Better Business Bureau Our Phone number is show contact info and we are located right next to Valley Fair Mall in San Jose at 373 South Monroe #203,San Jose .You can also visit us at www.smileydoctor.com and schedule an appointment. All Insurances Accepted: We aaccep most of the insurances including Delta , Metlife , Aetna , Guardian , Cigna , Blue Cross,Blue Shield , Wellpoint , Humana , Great West , Ameriplan , United Healthcare , Principal Health Insurance , kaiser dental ppo, and so on. Rated as one of the top quality dentist Our Friendly Smiley Doctor Team welcomes the whole Family-Kids,Adults,Seniors all welcome. Emergency Services 24/7 available to our patients We are Member of BBB and have treated over 11,000 people.
